description: Retrieves the individual task executions (one per target) for a particular task run as part of a maintenance window execution.

parameters.name: WindowExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution the task is part of.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the specific task in the maintenance window task that should be retrieved.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Optional filters used to scope down the returned task invocations. The supported filter key is STATUS with the corresponding values PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, SUCCESS, FAILED, TIMED_OUT, CANCELLING, and CANCELLED. (dict) --- Filter used in the request. Supported filter keys depend on the API operation that includes the filter. API operations that use MaintenanceWindowFilter> include the following: DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutions DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTaskInvocations DescribeMaintenanceWindowExecutionTasks DescribeMaintenanceWindows DescribeMaintenanceWindowTargets DescribeMaintenanceWindowTasks Key (string) --- The name of the filter. Values (list) --- The filter values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: WindowExecutionTaskInvocationIdentities
nested_items.description: Information about the task invocation results per invocation.

nested_items.name: WindowExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the maintenance window execution that ran the task.

nested_items.name: TaskExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the specific task execution in the maintenance window execution.

nested_items.name: InvocationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the task invocation.

nested_items.name: ExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the action performed in the service that actually handled the task invocation. If the task type is RUN_COMMAND, this value is the command ID.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters that were provided for the invocation when it was run.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the task invocation.

nested_items.name: StatusDetails
nested_items.description: The details explaining the status of the task invocation. Not available for all status values.

nested_items.name: OwnerInformation
nested_items.description: User-provided value that was specified when the target was registered with the maintenance window. This was also included in any Amazon CloudWatch Events events raised during the task invocation.

nested_items.name: WindowTargetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the target definition in this maintenance window the invocation was performed for.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is empty.
